intro: Linociera sudanica, commonly known as Sudanese linociera, is a shrub native to the Sahelian regions of Africa. It is adapted to arid environments and is often found in sandy or rocky soils. Linociera sudanica is used in traditional medicine for its potential anti-inflammatory and antispasmodic properties.
